description: This file defines the AttendeeRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository and provides methods for accessing Attendee data related to events, including finding attendees by event, counting attendees, and finding by event and email.

classes.name: AttendeeRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Attendee entities, providing database access methods.

methods.name: findByEvent
methods.description: Returns a list of attendees associated with a specific event.

methods.name: countByEvent
methods.description: Returns the number of attendees for a specific event.

methods.name: findByEventAndEmailIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds an attendee by event and email ignoring case differences.
